qas.question: What manufacturer became Arsenal's uniform provider in 1994?
Which brand was the kit provider prior to 1994?
To appeal to what are the kits changed regularly?
What traditional Arsenal colors have frequently been employed for away kits?
Since what year has the away kit been changed every year?
In what year was Arsenal's home colours kits last changed?
What color was Arsenal's away colours when Adidas was the kit provider?
What color away kit did Arsenal wear during the 2002-03 season?
What color away kit did Arsenal wear during the 2004-05 season?
In what year did the replica kit market start to become lucrative?

context: When <a0_0>Nike<a0_0/> took over from <a1_0>Adidas<a1_0/> as Arsenal's kit provider in 1994, Arsenal's away colours were again changed to two-tone blue shirts and shorts. Since the advent of the lucrative <a2_0>replica kit market<a2_0/>, the away kits have been changed regularly, with Arsenal usually releasing both away and third choice kits. During this period the designs have been either <b7_0>all blue<b7_0/> designs, or variations on the traditional <a3_0><b8_0>yellow and blue<b8_0/><a3_0/>, such as the <b6_0>metallic gold and navy strip<b6_0/> used in the 2001–02 season, the yellow and dark grey used from 2005 to 2007, and the yellow and maroon of <b9_0>2010<b9_0/> to 2013. As of <a4_0><b5_0>2009<b5_0/><a4_0/>, the away kit is changed every season, and the outgoing away kit becomes the third-choice kit if a new home kit is being introduced in the same year.
